issue.title: [CF 1448] Super High Usage?
issue.body:
v8.4.2

 

I'm trying to figure out a reason why I'm getting random super high world MS spikes, and one of the things to do is reset UI. I imported all my TMW info and my usage was almost 100MB (https://i.imgur.com/7f6vikz.jpg). With all my normal addons on, it usually only hits 20-25MB. 

 

I really don't know how much more info to put to this.

 


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1448 | Raw

comments.body:
What are you system specs that 100MB of memory is a concern?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
